Login_Description: I fill my heart with fire with you, without you, it's a cold and empty place.
Register_Description: Together, we will turn empty spaces into vibrant places filled with warmth and connection.
Register_Username_Error: Username is required! Must be at least 3 characters long!
Register_Email_Error: Email is required! Must be a valid email address!
Register_Password_Error: Password is required! Must be at least 6 characters long!
Register_Confirm_Password_Error: Confirm Password is required! Must match Password!
Settings_Description: Every setting is a brushstroke on the canvas of your universe.
Delete_Confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
Fetch_Users_Error: An error occurred while fetching users
Create_User_Error: An error occurred while creating user
Update_User_Error: An error occurred while updating user
Delete_User_Error: An error occurred while deleting user
Delete_User_Description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user and remove their data from our servers.
Create_User_Description: Create a new user by filling out the form below.
